summary.problem: Users experience issues with Dropbox files showing formatting errors and strikethrough numbers due to Excel calculation settings after an Excel upgrade.
summary.solution: In Excel, go to the 'Formulas' tab, then to the 'Calculation Options' section. Locate the 'Format stale values' option, which formats numbers not recalculated with a strikethrough. Uncheck this option to remove the formatting errors and resolve the issue.
